channel.title: [REQ] Delirium-X Graphic Artists
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g48/sk8formilk/DX.png[/img][size=22pt]Delirium-X GFX Artist Request[/size][img]http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g48/sk8formilk/DX.png[/img][/center]
Hello, My name is Cory and I'm relatively new to the Moparscape community. I was unsure where to post this kind of thread so I searched for threads of the similar type and it led me to this board.
[center][img]http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g48/sk8formilk/DXforum.png[/img][/center]
I am currently looking for a GFX artist for my new server. To apply fill out the following application.
[code]What is your name? How old are you? What programs do you use for graphics? How long have you been doing graphics? Can you post an example of your work? If not why?[/code]
I currently have 3 GFX artist spots open. I will not give staff in return for your GFX work but you will have a higher chance of getting staff. (This is because I need to get used to you and see how you work. Don't want people messing up my server.)
[b]A little background on my server.[/b] We have paid webhosting + VPS and domains. A very unique look to our forums will give you the play ground you need to let your skills flourish. We have paid advertising so we will gain players and your work will not be put to waste.
[center][size=18pt]GFX SPOTS:[/size][/center]
[center]---Leinan1337--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN---[/center]
[center][b]MSN: coryallen440@yahoo.com[/b][/center]

item.title: [REQ] Delirium-X Graphic Artists
item.dc:creator: @coryallen1 coryallen1
item.description:
@coryallen1 wrote:

Very nice example. If your up to it your both accepted. PM me for details on where to go to sign up and to work out payments/collateral.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Delirium-X Graphic Artists
item.dc:creator: @Leinan1337 Leinan1337
item.description:
@Leinan1337 wrote:

What is your name? August
How old are you? 16
What programs do you use for graphics? Photoshop CS5
How long have you been doing graphics? I havent been doing photoshop for more than a year, but have edited in diffrent pic programs for maybe 5 years or so.
Can you post an example of your work?

This is a Avatar I have maid for a player on a online game. I can edit much more, and also do banners.

Contact me on mail please: Leinan1337@gmail.com
Regards August

Read full topic

@Kayr wrote:

What is your name? Rather Not Say, You can Call Me Kay
How old are you? 17
What programs do you use for graphics? CS5 Extended
How long have you been doing graphics? 2 years
Can you post an example of your work? If not why? Here is something i snapped together.

Pm me if ya want me…
Thanks

item.title: [REQ] Delirium-X Graphic Artists
item.dc:creator: @coryallen1 coryallen1
item.description:
@coryallen1 wrote:

[center][size=22pt]Delirium-X GFX Artist Request[/size][/center]

Hello, My name is Cory and I’m relatively new to the Moparscape community. I was unsure where to post this kind of thread so I searched for threads of the similar type and it led me to this board.

[center][/center]

I am currently looking for a GFX artist for my new server. To apply fill out the following application.

What is your name? How old are you? What programs do you use for graphics? How long have you been doing graphics? Can you post an example of your work? If not why?

I currently have 3 GFX artist spots open. I will not give staff in return for your GFX work but you will have a higher chance of getting staff. (This is because I need to get used to you and see how you work. Don’t want people messing up my server.)

A little background on my server.
We have paid webhosting + VPS and domains. A very unique look to our forums will give you the play ground you need to let your skills flourish. We have paid advertising so we will gain players and your work will not be put to waste.

[center][size=18pt]GFX SPOTS:[/size][/center]

[center]—Leinan1337—
—OPEN—
—OPEN—[/center]

[center]MSN: coryallen440@yahoo.com[/center]
